venue.name: Acacia at Indian Meadows Club House

item.description:
We're having another Dance Party. Come drink, and dance to the music of DJBobby'D. The Party place is, Acacia at Indian Meadows Golf Course club house, 275 Turnpike Rd, Rt9, Westboro MA, 508-366-6526 on Saturday, December 12th 2009, from 8pm - 12:30am. Buy your tickets online, or at the door. YOU SAVE BEFORE 9:30pm. Come Join us for a Fabulous Night of dance music, and shake your booty down with DJBobby'D. http://www.acaciafunc... . See you there! Tickets are ....Singles$10.00 Online at (http://www.djbobbyd.c...) and $10.00 at the door. You DEFINITELY do not want to miss this one...

All sales are FINAL. No Refunds.

SPECIAL DISCOUNT for MeetUp members ONLY...$10 all night...No up charge after 9:30pm.... Come and enjoy. Bring as many guests as you want....
item.how_to_find_us: When paying as you enter, ask the attendant where the Meetup folks are
item.name: HOLIDAY DANCE - SATURDAY NIGHT
